00015         typedef boost::shared_ptr<BaseResult> BaseResult_ptr;

00022         class ConstPtrResult : public BaseResult
00023         {
00024             public:
00025                 static BaseResult_ptr make(const char* data, unsigned size)
00026                 {
00027                     return boost::make_shared<ConstPtrResult>(data, size);
00028                 }
00029             public:
00030                 ConstPtrResult(const char* data, unsigned size) :
00031                     _data(data), _size(size) {}
00032                 const char* data() const { return _data; }
00033                 unsigned size() const { return _size; }
00034             private:
00035                 const char* _data;
